title: If someone told you to write a logical statement about anything, what would your statement be? - Quora

response.answer_text: The more you have; the less it's worth, The more it's worth; the more you want, The less it's worth; the less you want, So, Anything can be valued if anyone wants it. A value is a meaning per say, and it's value becomes the main contributor to its purpose. Life’s meaning is what everyone wants from it, if no one wants anything for life it's value becomes null. As long as you want something, your life has meaning and purpose. Pretty cool huh? Another one is (following the previous logic) The more you have, the less you want So the more life you have, the less you want that. That's why people with ‘no lives’ are generally happy, the do what they want.

It is what it is. This is the most logical statement I can think of. It will always be what it is and nothing more. As people - thinkers - we tend to make something more than it really is, when in fact all it is, is what it is. Simply complex.
